tenant_id.title: Tenant ID
tenant_id.description: You can find the Tenant ID in the Azure Portal. After signing in, select 'Azure Active Directory' from the left-hand menu. The Tenant ID appears in the 'Tenant information' section on the 'Azure Active Directory' overview page.

site_url.title: Site URL
site_url.description: Enter the full URL of the SharePoint site you wish to access. You can find this URL in your browser's address bar when visiting your SharePoint site. Example: https://your_domain.sharepoint.com/sites/your_site_name). Note: Make sure to include the full URL, including the 'https://' prefix.

library_name.title: Library name (optional)
library_name.description: Name of the Document Library to download the data from.
